description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; a bridge with lamps curves diagonally from the lower left corner to the upper right corner; in the lower right corner is a body of water with circular ripples
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck. / E.66-II.-A | ULC of sheet, in pencil: 12) | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2407
portfolio: From Plate 12 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18. | LL in pencil, below image: Zu Gogol : der Mantel.
title: The Kalinkin Bridge, Which is Haunted at Night, Plate 12 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
